summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Phase 1 Data Integrity & Diagnostics System. All backend APIs and frontend UI components working correctly. Fixed route ordering issue for bulk delete endpoint.

fixed_issues.fix_applied: Moved bulk delete route before single record route in integrity.py

passed_tests: POST /api/integrity/scan returns scan results with 13-16 orphaned records
GET /api/integrity/scans returns scan history (9 previous scans)
Sidebar shows Diagnostics link under TOOLS section with ShieldCheck icon
Stats dashboard shows correct counts (Records Scanned, Issues Found, High Severity, Fixable Issues)
Issue list displays with HIGH severity badges and checkboxes for fixable issues
Bulk selection 'Select All Fixable' works correctly (selected 13 checkboxes)
Individual delete buttons work with trash icon and confirmation
Severity filter dropdown works (tested high/all options)
Bulk delete functionality works with confirmation dialog
Scan metadata displays Scan ID and completion timestamp
Both healthy system and issues found states display correctly
